alertDescription.value: pod status is terminating for more than 5 mins usually dues to there not being enough resources

query.value: InsightsMetrics | where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'kube_pod_status_reason' | extend Json = parse_json(Tags) | extend pod = tostring(Json.pod) | extend namespace = tostring(Json.namespace) | extend uid = tostring(Json.uid) | extend reason = tostring(Json.reason) | where reason == 'NodeLost' and Val == 0 | join kind=inner ( InsightsMetrics | where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'kube_pod_deletion_timestamp' | extend Json = parse_json(Tags) | extend pod = tostring(Json.pod) | extend namespace = tostring(Json.namespace) | extend uid = tostring(Json.uid) | project TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, DeleteTimestamp = unixtime_seconds_todatetime(Val), pod, namespace, uid) on TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, pod, namespace, uid | project TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, DeleteTimestamp, pod, namespace
